note: I am a woman who is classy, elegant, intelligent, educated, successful, mature, confident, adventurous, clever, affectionate, passionate, romantic, playful, caring, optimistic with a good personality and who enjoys similar interests as I do. I am also looking for someone who will be my best friend, work well together as partners and bring joy to each other, as we grow old together. I would love to create a warm, loving and happy home with that someone special.
